name: Brale Supported Transfer Types
description: Supported transfer_type values for Brale API transfers. Format matches API requirements where transfer_type specifies the payment rail or blockchain network.

offchain.name: Wire Transfer
offchain.description: Traditional bank wire transfer for fiat currencies

offchain.name: ACH Transfer
offchain.description: Automated Clearing House transfer for USD

offchain.name: SPEI Transfer
offchain.description: Mexican interbank transfer system for MXN
